alert.note: Alert for Borden; Howard; Mitchell (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 3:05PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Mitchell, south central Borden and central Howard Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 305 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Big Spring, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Big Spring, Coahoma, Sand Springs, Luther, Big Spring Country Club, Vincent and Big Spring McMahon-Wrinkle Airpark. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 174 and 199. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
